desc: Manually triggers synchronization of user data like settings, extensions, and keybindings across VS Code instances.
Opens the configuration options for user data synchronization in Visual Studio Code.
Opens the Settings Sync configuration page where you can manage preferences for synchronizing settings, extensions, and more across devices.
Opens the help interface for Visual Studio Code's Settings Sync feature.
Opens the log file that contains detailed information about the synchronization of user data like settings, extensions, and keybindings in VS Code.
Resets and clears all synchronized data (such as settings, extensions, and keyboard shortcuts) from the cloud, allowing you to start fresh or sync from a different state.
Turns on the synchronization of user data like settings, extensions, and keybindings across VS Code installations.
Turns off the synchronization of user data like settings, extensions, and keybindings across VS Code installations.
